0-hospitalbed.caption: A hospital bed with white frame, blue mattress, and multicolored control buttons. The bed has wheels for mobility and various adjustment mechanisms.

1-desk.caption: Gray desk with black tabletop and metal legs, featuring a side cabinet and open shelves.

2-chair.caption: Blue office chair with black backrest and silver metal base with wheels.

3-chair.caption: Office chair with blue fabric upholstery and black plastic armrests and base.

4-wheelchair.caption: A blue and white wheelchair with large gray wheels and a metal frame.

5-sidetable.caption: A rectangular table with a white top and gray metal legs, equipped with wheels for mobility.

6-book.caption: A yellow pencil with a black band near the tip and a sharpened graphite point.

7-trashcan.caption: A black trapezoidal block with smooth surfaces and sharp edges.

8-booksset.caption: A stack of books with beige covers, accented by green, orange, and black spines.

9-bottle.caption: A white plastic bottle with a blue label and cap.

global_caption:
The scene is a hospital room, likely a patient's room or a treatment room. The hospital bed (0-hospitalbed) is the central object, with a white frame, blue mattress, and multicolored control buttons. It has wheels for mobility and various adjustment mechanisms. The bed is positioned near a chair (2-chair) and to the left of a desk (1-desk).

The desk is gray with a black tabletop and metal legs, featuring a side cabinet and open shelves. It is situated near a trashcan (7-trashcan) to the right. The desk also supports a yellow pencil (6-book).

The room contains three chairs: a blue office chair (2-chair) near the hospital bed, an office chair with blue fabric upholstery and black plastic armrests and base (3-chair), and a wheelchair (4-wheelchair) near the third chair. The wheelchair is blue and white with large gray wheels and a metal frame.

A sidetable (5-sidetable) is positioned to the right of the hospital bed and to the left, behind the third chair. The sidetable has a white top and gray metal legs and is equipped with wheels for mobility. It supports a stack of books (8-booksset) with beige covers and a white plastic bottle (9-bottle) with a blue label and cap.

The scene suggests a functional and comfortable hospital room, with a focus on patient care and treatment. The hospital bed and wheelchair indicate that the room is designed for patients who may require mobility assistance. The desk and chairs provide a space for medical professionals to work and consult with patients. The sidetable and supported objects, such as the books and bottle, add a touch of warmth and personalization to the room. Overall, the scene conveys a sense of calm and professionalism, with a focus on patient care and comfort.
brief_caption:
Here is a summary of the scene in 2-3 sentences:

The scene depicts a hospital room with a hospital bed (0-hospitalbed) near a desk (1-desk) and a chair (2-chair). The desk has a trashcan (7-trashcan) to its right and a book (6-book) supported on its surface. A wheelchair (4-wheelchair) is positioned near a chair (3-chair) and a sidetable (5-sidetable) is placed to the right of the hospital bed and behind the chair, with a books set (8-booksset) and a bottle (9-bottle) supported on its surface.
